subject: [Radiance-general] rad4R0supp.tar.gz link currently busted?
body:
Like the subject line says, this link (
http://www.radiance-online.org/software/non-cvs/rad4R0supp.tar.gz<https://acs.nrel.gov/owa/,DanaInfo=mail.nrel.gov,SSL+redir.aspx?C=cdf900b146a2474398e6a7924fef8c50&URL=http%3a%2f%2fwww.radiance-online.org%2fsoftware%2fnon-cvs%2frad4R0supp.tar.gz>
) throws a perms error at you at the moment. The .bz2 archive link still
works, as does the HEAD release link. Probably a temporary thing, but just
in case not, here's this email about it, before I forget. =8-)

- Rob
